review: I have an Apple TV2 as well. We rarely use it anymore. The content available from Amazon Prime is good.Much less buffering than on Apple TV. An incredible bargain. Makes me that much closer to cutting the cable cord and only keeping Internet.

review: Already a Prime member with a wireless router, the setup was very easy, simply plug it in, set the input to the correct option and follow directions.
